@graph.name: Vegan Coconut Caramel Energy Balls ( Refined Sugar-free & Paleo)
@graph.description: Vegan Coconut Caramel Energy Balls are a healthy 3 ingredient snack that you can whip up in minutes! Naturally sweetened, paleo & with nut-free option!

itemListElement.name: Vegan Coconut Caramel Energy Balls (Coconut Caramel Bites)

@graph.name: Vegan Coconut Caramel Bites
@graph.description: These easy Coconut Caramel Energy Balls are a healthy 3 ingredient snack that you can whip up in minutes in your food processor. Naturally sweetened, paleo, vegan and the perfect healthy treat both kids and adults will love.
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cups coconut shreds (, small to medium shred, unsweetened and fresher the better)
1/4 cup almond butter or sun butter

recipeInstructions.text: Toast the coconut over a skillet until golden, keep stirring after the first minute.- Let the coconut cool for 10 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Toast the coconut over a skillet until golden, keep stirring after the first minute.- Let the coconut cool for 10 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the coconut to food processor and process to make smaller shreds, then add the dates and process until dates are evenly distributed over the coconuts- Add the salt and the almond butter and process again until the mixture forms fat, crumbs that sticks together easily.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the coconut to food processor and process to make smaller shreds, then add the dates and process until dates are evenly distributed over the coconuts- Add the salt and the almond butter and process again until the mixture forms fat, crumbs that sticks together easily.

recipeInstructions.text: If the mixture is not sticking together easily, add some more almond butter or if it is too crumbly then add a tsp of oat flour or regular flour.
recipeInstructions.name: If the mixture is not sticking together easily, add some more almond butter or if it is too crumbly then add a tsp of oat flour or regular flour.

recipeInstructions.text: Pulse a couple of times to combine. then shape into balls.
recipeInstructions.name: Pulse a couple of times to combine. then shape into balls.

recipeInstructions.text: Store them for up to a week in the refrigerator and a month in the freezer.
recipeInstructions.name: Store them for up to a week in the refrigerator and a month in the freezer.

@graph.keywords: coconut bliss balls, vegan coconut balls, vegan energy bites
